description: // Our single jersey ZQ Premium Merino in our seasonal colour, Turmeric. This fabric is knitted from ZQ certified merino and produced just for us in our range of exclusive colours. The superfine merino fibre is spun into a single twist yarn, creating a slightly textural fabric with naturally occurring slubs throughout. The single jersey knit structure gives this fabric mechanical stretch and great drape. Beautifully soft, merino jersey is ideal for all seasons and perfect for next-to-skin basics and layering.

// Our single jersey ZQ Premium Merino in Ivory. This fabric is knitted from ZQ certified merino and produced just for us in our range of exclusive colours. The superfine merino fibre is spun into a single twist yarn, creating a slightly textural fabric with naturally occurring slubs throughout. Due to the natural variation in merino yarn this fabric may have subtle colour variance on some threads throughout. This is a characteristic of the fabric and is not deemed as a flaw. The single jersey knit structure gives this fabric mechanical stretch and great drape. Beautifully soft, merino jersey is ideal for all seasons and perfect for next-to-skin basics and layering.
